module.name: alternative_solution
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of solutions provided to a functional or organic requirement.

inscope.li: identification of a solution responding to a functional or organic requirement;
identification of a solution provided by a particular organization;
description of a hierarchy of solutions;
identification of the parts used by a solution.

outscope.li: description of the requirements resolved by a solution.

uof.name: Alternative_solution
uof.description: The Alternative_solution UoF specifies the data structure to describe the variants for a product component or for a product function.
